title: Legal Authorities Management
description: Configure courts, tribunals, and statutory authorities for case jurisdiction and routing
overview: The Legal Authorities module is the master data repository for all courts, tribunals, tax authorities, and other statutory bodies. Proper configuration ensures accurate case categorization, jurisdiction tracking, and compliance with authority-specific deadlines and procedures.

keyFeatures.title: Authority Levels
keyFeatures.description: Hierarchical classification of authorities (High Court, Tribunal, Appellate, etc.)

keyFeatures.title: Jurisdiction Mapping
keyFeatures.description: Link authorities to geographic jurisdictions (State, City, Zone)

keyFeatures.title: Matter Types
keyFeatures.description: Define case categories handled by each authority level

keyFeatures.title: Bench Configuration
keyFeatures.description: Set up bench locations and sitting schedules

keyFeatures.title: Officer Designations
keyFeatures.description: Track officer titles and roles within each authority

keyFeatures.title: Contact Directory
keyFeatures.description: Maintain contact details and addresses for authorities

authorities.title: Authorities List
authorities.description: Browse and manage all configured legal authorities
authorities.whenToUse: When adding new authorities, updating existing entries, or searching for authority details

hierarchy.title: Legal Hierarchy
hierarchy.description: View and configure authority level classifications
hierarchy.whenToUse: When setting up the appellate structure or modifying authority level definitions

jurisdictions.title: Jurisdictions
jurisdictions.whenToUse: When adding new cities, zones, or updating jurisdiction boundaries

matter-types.title: Matter Types
matter-types.description: Configure case types and their authority associations
matter-types.whenToUse: When adding new case categories or updating matter type rules
